Header: Brigadier M.D.U.V. Gunatilake new Director of Military Intelligence
Content: Brigadier M.D.U.V. Gunatilake is appointed as the new Director of Military Intelligence (DMI). Military Spokesman Brigadier Roshan Seneviratne said the appointment was made due to the routine changes in positions. Former DMI Brigadier Suresh Sallay was transferred to the Intelligence Regiment.
